title: AJAXExamples

metadata.description: Learn about AJAXExamples with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Simple Examples
Create a simple XMLHttpRequest, and retrieve data from a TXT file
Create a XMLHttpRequest with a callback function, and retrieve data from a TXT file
Examples explained

Retrieve all header information 
of a resource (file)
Retrieve specific header information 
of a resource (file)
Examples explained

Load an XML file with AJAX
Retrieve the content of an XML file
Examples explained
Retrieve Server Data with PHP and ASP
Retrieve the content of a PHP file
Retrieve the content of an ASP file
Examples explained
Retrieve Database Information
Retrieve content from a database
Examples explained
AJAX Applications
View an XML CD catalog
Display XML data in an HTML table
Show XML data inside an HTML div element
Navigate through XML nodes
A simple CD catalog application

summary: This tutorial covers AJAXExamples concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use AJAXExamples effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of AJAXExamples and how to apply it in your projects.
